<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Adjust a 64-bit scaled number down to the appropriate width.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\pre Adding 64 to \\c Scale will not overflow INT16&#95;MAX.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="78"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DigitsT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a577d9fbdf827eebebf03e40b1d271f51"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::pair&lt;DigitsT, int16&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a577d9fbdf827eebebf03e40b1d271f51">getAdjusted</a>(uint64&#95;t Digits,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><Highlight kind="normal">                                               int16&#95;t Scale = 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;assert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(!std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;DigitsT&gt;::is&#95;signed, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;expected unsigned&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Width = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#ad2999ce6de7049e734c541cd6a868480">getWidth&lt;DigitsT&gt;</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Width == 64 || Digits &lt;= std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;DigitsT&gt;::max())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::make&#95;pair(Digits, Scale);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Shift right and round.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Shift = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a37c1fdede126353d80c3753dfe06f3c7">llvm::bit&#95;width</a>(Digits) - Width;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a8cfbb3bd6b2b9dbaee4f30a5b5fa5968">getRounded&lt;DigitsT&gt;</a>(Digits &gt;&gt; Shift, Scale + Shift,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><Highlight kind="normal">                             Digits &amp; (UINT64&#95;C(1) &lt;&lt; (Shift - 1)));</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Returns \\c (DigitsT&#95;MAX, MaxScale) for divide-by-zero (0 for 0/0).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DigitsT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#abe3c7dc3f454ec817ac2d56c8be27823"><Highlight kind="normal">std::pair&lt;DigitsT, int16&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#abe3c7dc3f454ec817ac2d56c8be27823">getQuotient</a>(DigitsT Dividend, DigitsT Divisor) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;assert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(!std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;DigitsT&gt;::is&#95;signed, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;expected unsigned&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;assert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(DigitsT) == 4 || </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(DigitsT) == 8,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">                </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;expected 32-bit or 64-bit digits&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check for zero.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Dividend)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::make&#95;pair(0, 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Divisor)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::make&#95;pair(std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;DigitsT&gt;::max(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#aa8aa6fe9d8188e55bf93404e0e19a7d9">MaxScale</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#ad2999ce6de7049e734c541cd6a868480">getWidth&lt;DigitsT&gt;</a>() == 64)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a0a6b36937186eb47bc6004f2eb0a7eee">divide64</a>(Dividend, Divisor);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Convenience helper for 32-bit quotient.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a6ccad2b9795edca3a0185cdcde0f9119"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::pair&lt;uint32&#95;t, int16&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a6ccad2b9795edca3a0185cdcde0f9119">getQuotient32</a>(uint32&#95;t Dividend,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Convenience helper for 64-bit quotient.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a92a467e68e9a45ee6bb19d320b095cd6"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::pair&lt;uint64&#95;t, int16&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a92a467e68e9a45ee6bb19d320b095cd6">getQuotient64</a>(uint64&#95;t Dividend,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                  uint64&#95;t Divisor) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Implementation of getLg() and friends.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Returns the rounded lg of \\c Digits&#42;2^Scale and an int specifying whether</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><Highlight kind="comment">/// this was rounded up (1), down (-1), or exact (0).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Returns \\c INT32&#95;MIN when \\c Digits is zero.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DigitsT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a702c858977d4ae7925fc8adca73af8cd"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::pair&lt;int32&#95;t, int&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a702c858977d4ae7925fc8adca73af8cd">getLgImpl</a>(DigitsT Digits, int16&#95;t Scale) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;assert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(!std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;DigitsT&gt;::is&#95;signed, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;expected unsigned&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!Digits)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::make&#95;pair(INT32&#95;MIN, 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get the floor of the lg of Digits.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;assert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Digits) &lt;= </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">sizeof</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(uint64&#95;t));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><Highlight kind="normal">  int32&#95;t LocalFloor = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a4f42ed6fd2569fa43f03814a17f9d94a">llvm::Log2&#95;64</a>(Digits);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get the actual floor.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><Highlight kind="normal">  int32&#95;t Floor = Scale + LocalFloor;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Digits == UINT64&#95;C(1) &lt;&lt; LocalFloor)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::make&#95;pair(Floor, 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Round based on the next digit.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LocalFloor &gt;= 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Round = Digits &amp; UINT64&#95;C(1) &lt;&lt; (LocalFloor - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::make&#95;pair(Floor + Round, Round ? 1 : -1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Get the lg (rounded) of a scaled number.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Get the lg of \\c Digits&#42;2^Scale.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Returns \\c INT32&#95;MIN when \\c Digits is zero.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#ab63347a46b40b723f19ea7e153024a5e"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DigitsT&gt; int32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#ab63347a46b40b723f19ea7e153024a5e">getLg</a>(DigitsT Digits, int16&#95;t Scale) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a702c858977d4ae7925fc8adca73af8cd">getLgImpl</a>(Digits, Scale).first;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Get the lg floor of a scaled number.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Get the floor of the lg of \\c Digits&#42;2^Scale.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Returns \\c INT32&#95;MIN when \\c Digits is zero.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a0c36a1c641beec6d22d4e371786cfce1"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DigitsT&gt; int32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a0c36a1c641beec6d22d4e371786cfce1">getLgFloor</a>(DigitsT Digits, int16&#95;t Scale) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Lg = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a702c858977d4ae7925fc8adca73af8cd">getLgImpl</a>(Digits, Scale);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Lg.first - (Lg.second &gt; 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Get the lg ceiling of a scaled number.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Get the ceiling of the lg of \\c Digits&#42;2^Scale.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Returns \\c INT32&#95;MIN when \\c Digits is zero.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#adcdfc7209364d72aac80aee58254acc4"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DigitsT&gt; int32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#adcdfc7209364d72aac80aee58254acc4">getLgCeiling</a>(DigitsT Digits, int16&#95;t Scale) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Lg = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a702c858977d4ae7925fc8adca73af8cd">getLgImpl</a>(Digits, Scale);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Lg.first + (Lg.second &lt; 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Implementation for comparing scaled numbers.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Compare two 64-bit numbers with different scales.  Given that the scale of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\c L is higher than that of \\c R by \\c ScaleDiff, compare them.  Return -1,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><Highlight kind="comment">/// 1, and 0 for less than, greater than, and equal, respectively.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\pre 0 &lt;= ScaleDiff &lt; 64</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#ac4653521234cb7bc516c08e898036a42">compareImpl</a>(uint64&#95;t L, uint64&#95;t R, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ScaleDiff);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Compare two scaled numbers.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Compare two scaled numbers.  Returns 0 for equal, -1 for less than, and 1</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><Highlight kind="comment">/// for greater than.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DigitsT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a0651aa0a52c69c4fe12cf730e7ed65ab"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">int</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a0651aa0a52c69c4fe12cf730e7ed65ab">compare</a>(DigitsT LDigits, int16&#95;t LScale, DigitsT RDigits, int16&#95;t RScale) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;assert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(!std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;DigitsT&gt;::is&#95;signed, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;expected unsigned&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check for zero.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!LDigits)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RDigits ? -1 : 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!RDigits)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check for the scale.  Use getLgFloor to be sure that the scale difference</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// is always lower than 64</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><Highlight kind="normal">  int32&#95;t lgL = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a0c36a1c641beec6d22d4e371786cfce1">getLgFloor</a>(LDigits, LScale), lgR = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a0c36a1c641beec6d22d4e371786cfce1">getLgFloor</a>(RDigits, RScale);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (lgL != lgR)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> lgL &lt; lgR ? -1 : 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compare digits.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LScale &lt; RScale)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#ac4653521234cb7bc516c08e898036a42">compareImpl</a>(LDigits, RDigits, RScale - LScale);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> -<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#ac4653521234cb7bc516c08e898036a42">compareImpl</a>(RDigits, LDigits, LScale - RScale);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Match scales of two numbers.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Given two scaled numbers, match up their scales.  Change the digits and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><Highlight kind="comment">/// scales in place.  Shift the digits as necessary to form equivalent numbers,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"><Highlight kind="comment">/// losing precision only when necessary.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If the output value of \\c LDigits (\\c RDigits) is \\c 0, the output value of</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\c LScale (\\c RScale) is unspecified.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><Highlight kind="comment">/// As a convenience, returns the matching scale.  If the output value of one</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><Highlight kind="comment">/// number is zero, returns the scale of the other.  If both are zero, which</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"><Highlight kind="comment">/// scale is returned is unspecified.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DigitsT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a9a4a7b9b4d6238cae16ec640dfd5d980"><Highlight kind="normal">int16&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a9a4a7b9b4d6238cae16ec640dfd5d980">matchScales</a>(DigitsT &amp;LDigits, int16&#95;t &amp;LScale, DigitsT &amp;RDigits,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><Highlight kind="normal">                    int16&#95;t &amp;RScale) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;assert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(!std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;DigitsT&gt;::is&#95;signed, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;expected unsigned&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LScale &lt; RScale)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Swap arguments.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a9a4a7b9b4d6238cae16ec640dfd5d980">matchScales</a>(RDigits, RScale, LDigits, LScale);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!LDigits)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RScale;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!RDigits || LScale == RScale)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LScale;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Now LScale &gt; RScale.  Get the difference.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><Highlight kind="normal">  int32&#95;t ScaleDiff = int32&#95;t(LScale) - RScale;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ScaleDiff &gt;= 2 &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#ad2999ce6de7049e734c541cd6a868480">getWidth&lt;DigitsT&gt;</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Don&#39;t bother shifting.  RDigits will get zero-ed out anyway.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><Highlight kind="normal">    RDigits = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LScale;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Shift LDigits left as much as possible, then shift RDigits right.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><Highlight kind="normal">  int32&#95;t ShiftL = std::min&lt;int32&#95;t&gt;(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a66191f0bcc8c62b784819e9e96ceeba2">llvm::countl&#95;zero</a>(LDigits), ScaleDiff);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(ShiftL &lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#ad2999ce6de7049e734c541cd6a868480">getWidth&lt;DigitsT&gt;</a>() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;can&#39;t shift more than width&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><Highlight kind="normal">  int32&#95;t ShiftR = ScaleDiff - ShiftL;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ShiftR &gt;= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#ad2999ce6de7049e734c541cd6a868480">getWidth&lt;DigitsT&gt;</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Don&#39;t bother shifting.  RDigits will get zero-ed out anyway.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="normal">    RDigits = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LScale;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><Highlight kind="normal">  LDigits &lt;&lt;= ShiftL;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><Highlight kind="normal">  RDigits &gt;&gt;= ShiftR;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><Highlight kind="normal">  LScale -= ShiftL;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><Highlight kind="normal">  RScale += ShiftR;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LScale == RScale &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;scales should match&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> LScale;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Get the sum of two scaled numbers.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Get the sum of two scaled numbers with as much precision as possible.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="comment">/// \\pre Adding 1 to \\c LScale (or \\c RScale) will not overflow INT16&#95;MAX.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DigitsT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a2ea304f89cf0f32d2eb977dbf1154b9e"><Highlight kind="normal">std::pair&lt;DigitsT, int16&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a2ea304f89cf0f32d2eb977dbf1154b9e">getSum</a>(DigitsT LDigits, int16&#95;t LScale,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal">                                   DigitsT RDigits, int16&#95;t RScale) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;assert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(!std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;DigitsT&gt;::is&#95;signed, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;expected unsigned&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check inputs up front.  This is only relevant if addition overflows, but</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// testing here should catch more bugs.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(LScale &lt; INT16&#95;MAX &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;scale too large&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(RScale &lt; INT16&#95;MAX &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;scale too large&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Normalize digits to match scales.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">  int16&#95;t Scale = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a9a4a7b9b4d6238cae16ec640dfd5d980">matchScales</a>(LDigits, LScale, RDigits, RScale);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute sum.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><Highlight kind="normal">  DigitsT Sum = LDigits + RDigits;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Sum &gt;= RDigits)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::make&#95;pair(Sum, Scale);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Adjust sum after arithmetic overflow.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><Highlight kind="normal">  DigitsT HighBit = DigitsT(1) &lt;&lt; (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#ad2999ce6de7049e734c541cd6a868480">getWidth&lt;DigitsT&gt;</a>() - 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::make&#95;pair(HighBit | Sum &gt;&gt; 1, Scale + 1);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Convenience helper for 32-bit sum.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a79f6ac2c63e1e6cd0e8e9487e538cfbe"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::pair&lt;uint32&#95;t, int16&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a79f6ac2c63e1e6cd0e8e9487e538cfbe">getSum32</a>(uint32&#95;t LDigits, int16&#95;t LScale,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><Highlight kind="normal">                                             uint32&#95;t RDigits, int16&#95;t RScale) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a2ea304f89cf0f32d2eb977dbf1154b9e">getSum</a>(LDigits, LScale, RDigits, RScale);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Convenience helper for 64-bit sum.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#ab975f361f73a7b92cc260f035577608b"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::pair&lt;uint64&#95;t, int16&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#ab975f361f73a7b92cc260f035577608b">getSum64</a>(uint64&#95;t LDigits, int16&#95;t LScale,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><Highlight kind="normal">                                             uint64&#95;t RDigits, int16&#95;t RScale) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a2ea304f89cf0f32d2eb977dbf1154b9e">getSum</a>(LDigits, LScale, RDigits, RScale);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Get the difference of two scaled numbers.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Get LHS minus RHS with as much precision as possible.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Returns \\c (0, 0) if the RHS is larger than the LHS.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DigitsT&gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#ab9b560559be7a6630fbee210b5b46f39"><Highlight kind="normal">std::pair&lt;DigitsT, int16&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#ab9b560559be7a6630fbee210b5b46f39">getDifference</a>(DigitsT LDigits, int16&#95;t LScale,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><Highlight kind="normal">                                          DigitsT RDigits, int16&#95;t RScale) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;assert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(!std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;DigitsT&gt;::is&#95;signed, </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;expected unsigned&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Normalize digits to match scales.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DigitsT SavedRDigits = RDigits;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> int16&#95;t SavedRScale = RScale;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a9a4a7b9b4d6238cae16ec640dfd5d980">matchScales</a>(LDigits, LScale, RDigits, RScale);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute difference.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (LDigits &lt;= RDigits)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::make&#95;pair(0, 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (RDigits || !SavedRDigits)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::make&#95;pair(LDigits - RDigits, LScale);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Check if RDigits just barely lost its last bit.  E.g., for 32-bit:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   1&#42;2^32 - 1&#42;2^0 == 4294967295 != 1&#42;2^32</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> RLgFloor = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a0c36a1c641beec6d22d4e371786cfce1">getLgFloor</a>(SavedRDigits, SavedRScale);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a0651aa0a52c69c4fe12cf730e7ed65ab">compare</a>(LDigits, LScale, DigitsT(1), RLgFloor + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#ad2999ce6de7049e734c541cd6a868480">getWidth&lt;DigitsT&gt;</a>()))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::make&#95;pair(std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;DigitsT&gt;::max(), RLgFloor);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::make&#95;pair(LDigits, LScale);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Convenience helper for 32-bit difference.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a8d13d936e9200fe2b879345d3da77469"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::pair&lt;uint32&#95;t, int16&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#a8d13d936e9200fe2b879345d3da77469">getDifference32</a>(uint32&#95;t LDigits,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                    int16&#95;t LScale,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                    uint32&#95;t RDigits,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                    int16&#95;t RScale) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#ab9b560559be7a6630fbee210b5b46f39">getDifference</a>(LDigits, LScale, RDigits, RScale);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00406" /><CodeLine lineNumber="406"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Convenience helper for 64-bit difference.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#ad988756d495382cf8808ebe430f3d344"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">inline</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::pair&lt;uint64&#95;t, int16&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#ad988756d495382cf8808ebe430f3d344">getDifference64</a>(uint64&#95;t LDigits,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00408" /><CodeLine lineNumber="408"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                    int16&#95;t LScale,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00409" /><CodeLine lineNumber="409"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                    uint64&#95;t RDigits,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00410" /><CodeLine lineNumber="410"><Highlight kind="normal">                                                    int16&#95;t RScale) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00411" /><CodeLine lineNumber="411"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/scalednumbers/#ab9b560559be7a6630fbee210b5b46f39">getDifference</a>(LDigits, LScale, RDigits, RScale);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Simple representation of a scaled number.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ScaledNumber is a number represented by digits and a scale.  It uses simple</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><Highlight kind="comment">/// saturation arithmetic and every operation is well-defined for every value.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><Highlight kind="comment">/// It&#39;s somewhat similar in behaviour to a soft-float, but is &#42;not&#42; a</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><Highlight kind="comment">/// replacement for one.  If you&#39;re doing numerics, look at \\a APFloat instead.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Nevertheless, we&#39;ve found these semantics useful for modelling certain cost</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><Highlight kind="comment">/// metrics.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The number is split into a signed scale and unsigned digits.  The number</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><Highlight kind="comment">/// represented is \\c getDigits()&#42;2^getScale().  In this way, the digits are</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"><Highlight kind="comment">/// much like the mantissa in the x87 long double, but there is no canonical</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00458" /><CodeLine lineNumber="458"><Highlight kind="comment">/// form so the same number can be represented by many bit representations.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00459" /><CodeLine lineNumber="459"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00460" /><CodeLine lineNumber="460"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ScaledNumber is templated on the underlying integer type for digits, which</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00461" /><CodeLine lineNumber="461"><Highlight kind="comment">/// is expected to be unsigned.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00462" /><CodeLine lineNumber="462"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00463" /><CodeLine lineNumber="463"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Unlike APFloat, ScaledNumber does not model architecture floating point</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00464" /><CodeLine lineNumber="464"><Highlight kind="comment">/// behaviour -- while this might make it a little faster and easier to reason</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00465" /><CodeLine lineNumber="465"><Highlight kind="comment">/// about, it certainly makes it more dangerous for general numerics.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ScaledNumber is totally ordered.  However, there is no canonical form, so</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><Highlight kind="comment">/// there are multiple representations of most scalars.  E.g.:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><Highlight kind="comment">///     ScaledNumber(8u, 0) == ScaledNumber(4u, 1)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00471" /><CodeLine lineNumber="471"><Highlight kind="comment">///     ScaledNumber(4u, 1) == ScaledNumber(2u, 2)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><Highlight kind="comment">///     ScaledNumber(2u, 2) == ScaledNumber(1u, 3)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00473" /><CodeLine lineNumber="473"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00474" /><CodeLine lineNumber="474"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ScaledNumber implements most arithmetic operations.  Precision is kept</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00475" /><CodeLine lineNumber="475"><Highlight kind="comment">/// where possible.  Uses simple saturation arithmetic, so that operations</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00476" /><CodeLine lineNumber="476"><Highlight kind="comment">/// saturate to 0 or getLargest() rather than under or overflowing.  It has</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00477" /><CodeLine lineNumber="477"><Highlight kind="comment">/// some extra arithmetic for unit inversion.  0.0/0.0 is defined to be 0.0.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00478" /><CodeLine lineNumber="478"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Any other division by 0 is defined to be getLargest().</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00479" /><CodeLine lineNumber="479"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00480" /><CodeLine lineNumber="480"><Highlight kind="comment">/// As a convenience for modifying the exponent, left and right shifting are</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00481" /><CodeLine lineNumber="481"><Highlight kind="comment">/// both implemented, and both interpret negative shifts as positive shifts in</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00482" /><CodeLine lineNumber="482"><Highlight kind="comment">/// the opposite direction.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00483" /><CodeLine lineNumber="483"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00484" /><CodeLine lineNumber="484"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Scales are limited to the range accepted by x87 long double.  This makes</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00485" /><CodeLine lineNumber="485"><Highlight kind="comment">/// it trivial to add functionality to convert to APFloat (this is already</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><Highlight kind="comment">/// relied on for the implementation of printing).</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Possible (and conflicting) future directions:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><Highlight kind="comment">///  1 Turn this into a wrapper around \\a APFloat.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><Highlight kind="comment">///  2 Share the algorithm implementations with \\a APFloat.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><Highlight kind="comment">///  3 Allow \\a ScaledNumber to represent a signed number.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalednumber"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">template</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DigitsT&gt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalednumber/#ad863b452c048cd1f590f2a03c86418d0">ScaledNumber</a> : <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalednumberbase">ScaledNumberBase</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;assert</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(!std::numeric&#95;limits&lt;DigitsT&gt;::is&#95;signed,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00496" /><CodeLine lineNumber="496"><Highlight kind="normal">                </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;only unsigned floats supported&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00497" /><CodeLine lineNumber="497"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00498" /><CodeLine lineNumber="498" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalednumber/#a39a9b3b5693bddd5768ef973f429924f"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">typedef</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DigitsT <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalednumber/#a39a9b3b5693bddd5768ef973f429924f">DigitsType</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Convert to a decimal representation in a string.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Convert to a string.  Uses scientific notation for very large/small</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// numbers.  Scientific notation is used roughly for numbers outside of the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// range 2^-64 through 2^64.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// \\c Precision indicates the number of decimal digits of precision to use;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// 0 requests the maximum available.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// As a special case to make debugging easier, if the number is small enough</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// to convert without scientific notation and has more than \\c Precision</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// digits before the decimal place, it&#39;s printed accurately to the first</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// digit past zero.  E.g., assuming 10 digits of precision:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///     98765432198.7654... =&gt; 98765432198.8</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///      8765432198.7654... =&gt;  8765432198.8</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///       765432198.7654... =&gt;   765432198.8</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///        65432198.7654... =&gt;    65432198.77</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///         5432198.7654... =&gt;     5432198.765</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalednumber/#a628cc55e3eb3abc28be11f6fb90b948a"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::string <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalednumber/#a628cc55e3eb3abc28be11f6fb90b948a">toString</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Precision = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalednumberbase/#a688aa1569355f832c6963c66f1a1b9cd">DefaultPrecision</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalednumberbase/#ac19c88b3b4cddc454681f6650e130733">ScaledNumberBase::toString</a>(Digits, Scale, Width, Precision);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Print a decimal representation.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Print a string.  See toString for documentation.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalednumber/#a12e80c71e0aef35ac69abbd5ebe3ba83"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalednumber/#a12e80c71e0aef35ac69abbd5ebe3ba83">print</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/raw-ostream">raw&#95;ostream</a> &amp;OS,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><Highlight kind="normal">                     </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">unsigned</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Precision = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalednumberbase/#a688aa1569355f832c6963c66f1a1b9cd">DefaultPrecision</a>)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/scalednumberbase/#aa69813e836793123b14be88585fd29bc">ScaledNumberBase::print</a>(OS, Digits, Scale, Width, Precision);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
